article_title: Half Of Employers Pushing High Deductible Plans Onto Workers

article_metadata.description: Almost half of the nation’s large employers are offering a consumer-directed health plan, which uses a high deductible strategy that is designed in part to make workers think twice before choosing an expensive and potentially unnecessary treatment or procedure. The new annual national survey of employers from benefits consultancy Mercer shows [...]
